amendment.description: To specify a minimum level of funding for regulation of dietary supplements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2090 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2090 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S14011-14012; text: CR S14011) To specify a minimum level of funding for regulation of dietary supplements.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2090 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2090 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Hatch.
